Detailed Description

Class RTRConfigVariable offers clients a convenient way to access configuration parameter values. If a value is not available for the parameter, the config variable will be in an error state.

A config variable is typcally obtained from a configuration database.

error() returns TRUE if a value is available for the config variable. value() returns the value of the config variable as an RTRExternalValue.

    RTRString value = var;
    int i = var.toInteger();
    float f = var.toFloat();
    RTRBOOL b = var.toBoolean();

See Also:
RTRObjectId, RTRConfigDb, RTRXFileDb, RTRExternalValue
